import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./searchItem.css"; const SearchItem = ({ name, distance, tag, type, description, free_cancel, price, rate, rate_text, img_url, hotel_id, }) => { return (

{name}

{distance} from center {tag} {description} {type} {/* If can cancel */} {free_cancel ? (
Free cancellation You can cancel later, so lock in this great price today!
) : (
)}
{rate_text}
From ${price} Includes taxes and fees
); }; export default SearchItem;
